entities.Description: Agencies that promote and support the development and use of renewable energy sources.
Energy generated from the wind through the use of wind turbines to produce electricity.
The use of less energy to provide the same level of output or service, resulting in reduced energy consumption, cost savings, and environmental benefits.
Renewable energy generated from sources located in bodies of water, such as wind farms or tidal power plants.
The process of capturing and storing energy for later use.

relations.Description: Energy and health implements building standards that promote the use of energy-saving designs and materials.
relations.Subject: energy and health

relations.Description: Energy and health funds research on renewable energy to promote sustainable and clean energy sources.
relations.Subject: energy and health

relations.Description: Energy and health focuses on improving access to clean cooking solutions to reduce indoor air pollution and promote better health.
relations.Subject: energy and health

relations.Description: Energy and health is involved in the Sustainable Energy for All Initiative to ensure universal access to sustainable energy and promote health benefits.
relations.Subject: energy and health

relations.Description: Energy and health partners with the Ministry of Health to integrate energy considerations into healthcare facilities and promote energy-efficient practices.
relations.Subject: energy and health

relations.Description: Energy and health contributes to climate change mitigation by promoting renewable energy sources and reducing greenhouse gas emissions.
relations.Subject: energy and health

relations.Description: Energy and health monitors energy consumption patterns to identify areas for improvement and promote energy efficiency.
relations.Subject: energy and health

relations.Description: Energy and health targets universal access to energy to ensure equitable distribution and improve health outcomes.
relations.Subject: energy and health

relations.Description: Energy and health addresses energy poverty by implementing programs and policies to provide affordable and reliable energy services.

relations.Subject: offshore renewable energy
relations.Description: Offshore renewable energy focuses on harnessing wave energy as a sustainable energy source.

relations.Subject: energy poverty indices
relations.Description: Energy poverty indices implement energy access programs to provide affordable and reliable energy services to underserved communities.

relations.Description: Energy poverty indices fund renewable energy projects to increase access to clean and sustainable energy sources.
